title: A Look At Markets, Amazon, And Facebook's New Name
itunes:title: A Look At Markets, Amazon, And Facebook's New Name
description:
Ed Ludlow, West Coast Correspondent covering big tech, discusses Amazon's 20% stake in EV maker Rivian. John Augustine, CIO of Huntington Private Bank, talks markets. Brenda O’Connor, Senior Vice President, Financial Advisor for UBS International, discusses her investment outlook. Mark Bergen, Technology Reporter for Bloomberg News, discusses the reasoning behind Facebook's new name. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Kailey Leinz.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
